# readarr_notification (Data Source)

<!-- subcategory:Notifications -->Single [Notification](../resources/notification).

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "readarr_notification" "example" {
  name = "Example"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->

- `name` (String) Notification name.
